title: To Help End the Yemen War, All China Had to Do Was Be Reasonable
description:
With Joe Biden nowhere to be found, China’s diplomacy set the stage for Saudi concessions and cease-fire talks.

title: Israeli Settlers Move on the Holiest Site in Jerusalem — Setting Off a New Crisis

title: Lie Detector Firm Lobbies CIA, DOD on Automated Eye-Scanning Tech
description:
